p: The results of chemical composition and antiradical activity were expressed as mean ± standard deviation (SD) obtained from three individual experiments carried out in triplicate. One-way analysisof variance (ANOVA) was performed followed by Tukey’s test to check for differences ( p < 0.05) between samples. Aiming to characterize the male and the female B. myriocephala and B. trimera specimens, principal component analysis (PCA) was used in autoscaled data [ 31]. Statistical analysis was performed using GraphPad Prism v. 5.0 software and Statistica 7 (StatSoft, Tulsa, OK, USA).
